      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain
      Constructs a Bain neural network from a chromosome using the ES-HyperNEAT encoding scheme (see Risi S.
      class  HyperNEATTranscriberBain
      Constructs a Bain neural network from a chromosome using the hypercube (from HyperNEAT) encoding scheme.
      class  HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase
      Base class for HyperNEAT-based transcribers that create BainNN neural network phenotypes.
      class  HyperNEATTranscriberGridNet
      Constructs a GridNet neural network from a chromosome using the hypercube (from HyperNEAT) encoding scheme.
